string-array.name: changelog
string-array.item:
New in version 1.2

  • Added changelog.
  • Long-press a button to change its time.
  • Notification icon.
  • New look.
  • Vibration option
  • Fixed minor bug (really this time)

New in version 1.3

  • Fixed graphical glitches.
  • OK button on help screen (wow!).
  • Fixed default alarm not working.

New in version 1.4

  • Hopefully the alarm will now always go off.
  • Turns on and unlocks screen on alarm (unless you have a password)
  • Reset button.
  • Still ugly. If you\'re a designed and have some free time, contact me!
  • Correctly outputs sound using "alarm" stream rather than "media".

New in version 1.4.1

  • Fix when app is killed due to low memory.
  • Menu icons.

New in version 1.4.2

  • Save to SD.
  • Change system alarm volume from settings. This affects all alarm apps, whereas the relative volume only affects this one (and is cumulative with the system alarm volume).
